result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: DE not competent to stand trial, case suspended

records.addlTxt: Signed and filed: Order of Commitment for Treatment
Received and Filed: Proposed Order of Commitment for Treatment

Defendant Bobbie Jean Rhodes appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Paige Styler in court on behalf of Attorney Theodore D. Kafkas for Bobbie Jean Rhodes.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a Doctor's Report Return.  Parties do not contest the report.  Court adopts the Doctor's findings and orders Ms. Rhodes COMMITTED to the Outpatient Competency Restoration Program.  Order of Commitment for Treatment signed and filed by the Court.  Court orders TURNOVER to Justice Point for LEVEL 4 SUPERVISION.  Court scheduled a status conference and Doctor's Report Return.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Status conference scheduled for November 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for January 26, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Competency Report Dated 10/20/22

Defendant Bobbie Jean Rhodes appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Theodore D. Kafkas appeared by video for Bobbie Jean Rhodes.  Attorney Gerald Alder in court for State of Wisconsin on behalf of Attorney James C Griffin.

Case in court for a Doctor's Report Return.  Doctor Jenna Niess filed an extension request.  Court grants extension.  Bail motion by Defense argued and denied by the Court.  Court rescheduled Doctor's Report Return.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Doctor Report Return Extension Request by Doctor Jenna Niess
Signed and filed: Order for Competency
Received and Filed:  Proposed Order for Competency

Defendant Bobbie Jean Rhodes appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Theodore D. Kafkas appeared by video for Bobbie Jean Rhodes.  Attorney Amanda Kirklewski in court for State of Wisconsin on behalf of Attorney James C Griffin.

Case in court for a return on warrant.  Defense requests a competency examination.  Court ordered competency examination by the Department of Health Services.  Defendant is to remain in custody for the examination.  Case adjourned for a Doctor's Report Return in Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Bench warrant cleared by Milwaukee County Sheriff on 9/14/2022. Original bench warrant in file. Case is adjourned until 09/20/2022 for Return on Bench Warrant in Branch 02. Notice is given to Public Defender's Office and District Attorney.
Justice Point Discharge Report, filed. Forwarded to Judge for review.
Signature bond forfeited per court order.

Defendant Bobbie Jean Rhodes not in court.  Attorney Theodore D. Kafkas in court in person for Bobbie Jean Rhodes.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 

Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued and signature bond to be forfeited.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report
Pretrial Services Status Report

Defendant Bobbie Jean Rhodes in court, appear in person.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report
No Contact Order signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with DM.

Defendant Bobbie Jean Rhodes in court with attorney Sam Obscherning.  Defendant Bobbie Jean Rhodes in custody.  Dax Odom appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bobbie Jean Rhodes appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Commissioner advised DNA sample has NOT been obtained from the Defendant.  Court ordered the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department to obtain DNA sample from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant she may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if she meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
